headline: Mondelez International, Inc. (MDLZ): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Mondelez International, Inc. on Bullseye Picks’s Substack by Bullseye Investing. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MDLZ. Mondelez International, Inc.’s share was trading at $57.57 as of November 28th. MDLZ’s trailing and forward P/E were 21.56 and 18.28 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Mondelez International (NASDAQ: MDLZ), […]
